tool_description: Creates comprehensive audit trails documenting all laboratory system activities for regulatory compliance and security monitoring.

activity_type.description: Type of activity: user_login, data_entry, result_modification, system_access, report_generation

user_id.description: ID of user performing the activity

affected_records.description: List of record IDs affected by this activity

activity_description.description: Detailed description of the activity performed

error_messages: Invalid activity type: Activity type must be one of the predefined categories.
User not found: User ID does not exist in the system user database.
Invalid timestamp: Timestamp must be in valid ISO format and not in the future.
Description too vague: Activity description must be specific and detailed for audit purposes.
IP address format error: IP address must be in valid IPv4 or IPv6 format.
Session expired: Session ID is no longer valid or has expired.
usage: Provide activity_type, user_id, timestamp, and detailed activity_description. Include affected_records, ip_address, and session_id for complete audit documentation.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for this audit trail entry

logging_status.description: Status of audit log creation: success, warning, or error

integrity_hash.description: Cryptographic hash ensuring audit record integrity

retention_period.description: How long this audit record will be retained
